transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Optimus Prime run for Cybertronian President?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because his campaign slogan was 'Freedom is the right of all sentient beings... including your vote!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Megatron's favorite political strategy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The 'Peace through Tyranny' platform - surprisingly unpopular with the electorate!

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Starscream's presidential campaign fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Every time he gave a speech, he'd start with 'I should be leader!' and end with 'MEGATRON IS A FOOL!' - terrible for polling numbers.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon Party's official stance on healthcare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Universal Energon coverage... as long as you pledge absolute loyalty to Megatron. Pre-existing conditions include Autobot sympathies.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why don't Autobots and Decepticons ever form a coalition government?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'bipartisan cooperation' loses something when one party's platform is literally 'enslave the universe.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when Shockwave tried to gerrymander Cybertron's districts?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He redrew the maps so perfectly logical that every district became a straight line, accidentally creating the 'Cube District' with 90-degree angles only.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Bumblebee get elected as Cybertron's youngest senator?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His campaign focused on 'rolling out' new policies and 'transforming' the economy. Plus, his debate opponent couldn't understand his speech impediment.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot Party's foreign policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Roll out to help our allies, but first let me consult the Matrix... okay, we're helping.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Megatron veto the 'Cybertronian Environmental Protection Act'?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He claimed it would 'restrict Energon mining operations' and 'hurt Decepticon job creators.' Also, the act specifically banned planet-wide fusion cannon usage.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened during the Great Energon Tax Debate of 2024?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Optimus proposed a progressive Energon tax, Megatron countered with 'taxation is theft,' and Starscream just kept screaming 'I SHOULD BE TREASURER!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Soundwave become the most successful political strategist?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His ability to 'eavesdrop' on opposition communications gave his candidates a 100% polling advantage. Ethics committee still investigating.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon stance on gun control?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'The only thing that stops a bad guy with a fusion cannon is a good guy with a bigger fusion cannon.' - Megatron at the NRA convention.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Ultra Magnus lose the Cybertronian mayoral race?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His campaign slogan was 'I can't deal with that now' - not exactly inspiring confidence in crisis management.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the outcome of the Autobot-Decepticon Peace Summit?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They agreed to disagree, then immediately accused each other of bad faith when Megatron's fusion cannon 'accidentally' discharged during the handshake photo op.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Wheeljack's political career end after one term?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Every policy he proposed ended with '...and then it exploded.' The healthcare plan literally exploded. Twice.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon immigration policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Welcome to New Kaon! Please form orderly lines for processing... into the smelting pits.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Ratchet refuse to run for office?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'I'm a medic, not a politician. Besides, have you seen the state of Cybertron's healthcare system? I need 6 million years just to fix that mess!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Constructicons tried to build a border wall?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They accidentally built it around their own headquarters. Devastator couldn't figure out how to get to his own campaign office.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Optimus Prime's infrastructure bill fail in the Senate?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Megatron filibustered for 47 hours straight about how 'roads are for Autobot scum' while occasionally firing warning shots at the ceiling.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Starscream's position on term limits?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Term limits are for leaders who DON'T deserve to rule forever!' - His 47th consecutive term as Air Commander.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Cybertronian Supreme Court ruling on Energon corporations cause chaos?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They ruled that 'corporations are people too' - now Unicron is technically a person and demanding voting rights.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Perceptor's science funding bill get rejected?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Lawmakers claimed his research into 'miniaturization technology' was just an excuse to make smaller versions of himself to filibuster faster.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot Party's position on campaign finance reform?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'All campaign contributions must be transparent... unless they're from the Matrix, which technically doesn't exist as a legal entity.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Blaster lose the Cybertronian Communications Commission chairmanship?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept interrupting hearings with 'Autobots, transform and roll out!' over the emergency broadcast system.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to unionize?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Megatron personally crushed the union because 'collective bargaining interferes with my tyranny.' The union rep was Starscream, so no great loss.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Ironhide's agricultural subsidy bill fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He proposed growing organic Energon on farms. The committee asked what farms exist on Cybertron. Ironhide responded 'That's why we need subsidies!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon education policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Education is important. That's why every Decepticon must memorize Megatron's speeches. Critical thinking is treason.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Jazz's cultural appropriation bill cause controversy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to appropriate Earth culture by transforming into a boombox. The committee said that was just his alt-mode. Jazz replied 'Exactly!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened during the Cybertronian Census?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They couldn't count the Decepticons because half were in the hospital from Starscream-related injuries and the other half were plotting coups.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Kup's veterans' benefits bill get tabled indefinitely?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept referring to 'back in my day' and the committee fell asleep during his 6-hour speech about the Quintesson Wars.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon energy policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Drill baby drill... into other planets, strip them of resources, and leave them as lifeless husks. It's the American way!' - Megatron, confusing planets.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Tracks' infrastructure beautification project fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to add racing stripes to all public buildings. The budget committee said that wasn't infrastructure. Tracks called them 'philistines.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the outcome of the Cybertronian Electoral College debate?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They couldn't decide if each Transformer should count as one vote, or if combiner teams should count as five. Devastator demanded 6 votes.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Sunstreaker's vanity tax proposal get laughed out of committee?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to tax anyone who wasn't as beautiful as him. The committee pointed out that would tax 99.9% of Cybertron. Sunstreaker said 'Exactly!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot position on net neutrality?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'All data should be treated equally... unless it's Decepticon propaganda, which should be blocked by Omega Supreme firewalls.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Powerglide's aviation bill never take off?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He proposed mandatory flight training for all Cybertronians. The committee asked how that would work for triple-changers. Powerglide transformed and flew away.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to register as a political party?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Their platform was just 'Conquer everything' written in blood. The registrar asked if they had any other policies. They added 'Also, destroy Autobots.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Hound's environmental protection bill face opposition?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to preserve Earth's natural beauty. The committee said Cybertron has no environment to protect. Hound showed them pictures of Earth and they voted yes.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon criminal justice reform?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Justice reform: If you're not a Decepticon, you're guilty. If you are a Decepticon, you're innocent. Unless you're Starscream, then you're always guilty.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Sideswipe's sports funding bill get sidelined?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He proposed Cybertronian Olympics with events like 'Fastest Transformation' and 'Best Megatron Impression.' The committee couldn't agree on judging criteria.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the Great Cybertronian Shutdown of 2024?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The government shut down because Megatron refused to fund anything that didn't include 'Death to Autobots' in the budget. The Autobots used the time to actually fix things.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Cliffjumper's minimum wage bill explode?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Literally. He got so angry during the debate that his explosive personality caused his own podium to detonate. The bill died with the podium.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot housing policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Every Transformer deserves a place to park... I mean live. Preferably not in vehicle mode, but we're working on it.' - Optimus Prime, confused about housing.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Windcharger's electromagnetic pulse regulation bill short-circuit?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept accidentally activating his own powers during testimony, causing power outages in the entire legislative building.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened during the Decepticon primary debates?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: All candidates agreed on destroying the Autobots, then spent 3 hours arguing about the best way to do it. The winner was 'whoever can defeat Starscream's betrayal.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Mirage's transparency bill vanish into thin air?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He proposed making all government actions visible to citizens. The bill mysteriously disappeared after he demonstrated his invisibility powers.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon economic stimulus plan?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'We'll stimulate the economy by conquering planets and stealing their resources. It's trickle-down tyranny!' - Megatron, economist.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Bluestreak's gun control bill trigger opposition?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He talked so much during the presentation that the committee ran out of time to vote. His filibuster was literally just his normal speaking speed.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the Cybertronian equivalent of Brexit?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Cybexit: When the Decepticons tried to leave Cybertron but couldn't agree on who would pilot the ship. Starscream volunteered and everyone voted to stay.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Smokescreen's campaign finance reform bill disappear in a cloud of smoke?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He used his smoke powers to obscure the vote count. When the smoke cleared, the bill had somehow transformed into a Decepticon campaign donation.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot position on artificial intelligence rights?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'All sentient beings deserve rights... except the Decepticons. They're more artificial than intelligent.' - Optimus Prime, creating policy loopholes.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Grapple's urban planning commission get demolished?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to build the perfect city but kept getting into arguments about whether buildings should transform into robots. The commission transformed into chaos.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to filibuster?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Megatron's filibuster lasted 47 hours because he kept monologuing about his greatness. The Autobots used the time to pass every bill he'd been blocking.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Hoist's infrastructure repair bill get stuck?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept trying to tow the broken political system to the repair shop, but it was too heavy with corruption. Even his tow cable couldn't handle it.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon social media policy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'All posts must praise Megatron. Likes are mandatory. Dislikes are punishable by fusion cannon.' - Terms of Service, Decepticon Twitter.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Red Alert's national security bill trigger a lockdown?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He got so paranoid about potential threats that he locked down the entire government. The threat was his own bill.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the outcome of the Great Energon Pipeline Debate?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The Autobots wanted to build it safely, the Decepticons wanted to steal it, and Starscream wanted to redirect it to his house. The pipeline burst from indecision.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Inferno's fire safety regulations bill combust?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He got too passionate during his presentation and literally set the bill on fire with his enthusiasm. The fire department voted against it.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Autobot position on universal basic Energon?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Every Transformer deserves enough Energon to function... unless you're a Decepticon, then you deserve to function poorly.' - Optimus Prime, policy maker.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Warpath's defense spending bill go ballistic?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept punctuating his speech with 'KA-BLAM!' every time he mentioned budget increases. The committee thought he was having mechanical seizures.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened during the Cybertronian Electoral College certification?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Megatron objected to every Autobot vote by firing his fusion cannon at the vote counters. The certification lasted 3 weeks and 847 objections.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Beachcomber's renewable energy bill wash away?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He proposed using tidal energy from Cybertron's non-existent oceans. When told Cybertron has no water, he said 'That's why we need the bill!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon position on government transparency?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'The government is perfectly transparent. You can see right through our lies... wait, that's not what we meant.' - Megatron, clarifying.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Seaspray's maritime law bill sink?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept insisting Cybertron needed maritime law despite having no seas. The committee said his argument didn't hold water.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the Cybertronian equivalent of a government shutdown?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: When Megatron and Optimus couldn't agree on the budget, they just shut down the government and continued fighting. It was Tuesday.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Cosmos' space exploration funding bill never launch?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He wanted to explore the universe for new allies. The committee asked why he kept getting lost in Earth's orbit. He said he was 'scouting ahead.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon position on climate change?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Climate change is a hoax perpetrated by Autobot scientists... unless it helps us conquer planets, then it's real and useful.' - Megatron, scientist.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Powerglide's aviation safety regulations stall?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He kept demonstrating unsafe flying during the presentation. The committee grounded the bill... and Powerglide.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened during the Cybertronian State of the Union address?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Optimus gave a hopeful speech about unity. Megatron responded by declaring war. It was the most productive State of the Union in Cybertronian history.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Megatron's military strategy during the Battle of Autobot City fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Step 1: Monologue for 20 minutes about the glory of Decepticons. Step 2: Get distracted by Starscream's treachery. Step 3: Lose anyway.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobots always win despite being outnumbered?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Decepticon military planning involves 90% internal backstabbing and 10% actual fighting. Starscream's betrayal count: 847 and rising.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most effective Decepticon military tactic?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The 'Retreat and Blame Starscream' maneuver - surprisingly effective at preserving troops while maintaining plausible deniability.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot medic corps have a 100% success rate?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Ratchet's battlefield triage: 'If you're still sparking, you're fine. If you're not, you're scrap. Next patient!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to use human military tactics?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They read Sun Tzu's 'Art of War' and concluded that Starscream embodies 'know yourself, know your enemy' - he's both his own worst enemy AND everyone else's.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Battle of Chicago last exactly 3 hours and 47 minutes?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: That's how long it took Optimus to finish his inspirational speech, punch Megatron through a building, and remember he had a flight mode the whole time.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon equivalent of 'friendly fire'?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Starscream fire' - when your second-in-command shoots you in the back for the 847th time and claims it was 'accidental targeting error.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot special forces always succeed?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because when your team includes a ninja-bot, a samurai-bot, and a dinosaur-bot, failure isn't really an option. It's just Tuesday.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was Shockwave's contribution to Decepticon military intelligence?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: He created a perfectly logical battle plan that accounted for every variable except 'Starscream will definitely betray us again.' The plan lasted 3.7 seconds.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobots never need a military draft?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Volunteer for the Autobot cause!' sounds way better than 'Join the Decepticons or we'll melt you down for spare parts.' Different recruitment strategies.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to use espionage?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Soundwave's infiltration was perfect until he started referring to himself in the third person. 'Soundwave superior, Autobots inferior' tends to blow your cover.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot-Decepticon ceasefire talks always fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They'd agree to terms, shake hands, then Megatron would immediately start charging his fusion cannon while claiming it was 'just for ceremonial purposes.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most devastating weapon in the Transformers arsenal?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Optimus Prime's motivational speeches - they can turn a losing battle into a victory while making you feel guilty about not believing hard enough.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Decepticon navy never succeed?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Turns out that 'submarine mode' isn't very effective when your entire fleet is made of giant robots who sink immediately. Who knew metal doesn't float?

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the outcome of the Great Energon Wars?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Millions of years of fighting over glowing blue juice, and the solution was literally just 'find a new planet with more juice.' Advanced alien robots, everyone.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobots always win the propaganda war?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Freedom is the right of all sentient beings' vs. 'All hail Megatron or die horribly.' Surprisingly, one tested better with focus groups.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of 'rules of engagement'?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Rule 1: There are no rules. Rule 2: If there were rules, Starscream would break them. Rule 3: Blame any failures on Starscream regardless of actual involvement.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Battle of Cybertron last 4 million years?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Both sides kept getting distracted by Starscream's daily betrayals, Megatron's monologues, and Optimus's speeches about hope. Plus, someone kept forgetting to set their alarm for the final battle.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to use biological warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They weaponized the common cold. The Autobots just got slightly runny energon dispensers for a week. Medical science is hard when you're made of metal.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot military academy have a 100% graduation rate?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Today we learn about courage, honor, and how to dodge Megatron's fusion cannon while giving an inspirational speech.' Everyone passed the final exam.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most common Decepticon military injury?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Starscream-induced back wounds. The medical corps has a special form for it: 'Injury Code 847-S: Treachery-related laser blast to dorsal plating.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobots never need military intelligence?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Decepticon plans were so predictable: Step 1 - Monologue. Step 2 - Betray someone. Step 3 - Lose anyway. Step 4 - Blame Starscream.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What was the Decepticon plan for world domination?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Step 1: Find Earth. Step 2: Monologue about destroying Earth. Step 3: Get distracted by Energon. Step 4: Lose to a truck and his friends. Repeat for 40 years.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot-Decepticon peace treaty last exactly 12 minutes?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: That's how long it took for someone to mention Energon distribution, Megatron to call dibs on everything, and Optimus to remember why they were fighting in the first place.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon equivalent of 'victory conditions'?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'When Megatron says we've won, regardless of actual battlefield status, and Starscream hasn't betrayed us yet.' So basically never.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobots always have superior logistics?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Wheeljack's inventions worked exactly as intended 23% of the time, but that was still better than Decepticon logistics which involved 90% Starscream complaining and 10% actual supply management.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried to use psychological warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They broadcast Megatron's speeches 24/7. The Autobots just used them as white noise for meditation. Turns out 4 million years of the same monologue loses its psychological impact.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot medical corps never run out of supplies?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Decepticon attacks were so predictable that Ratchet could schedule repairs during their monologues. 'Megatron's at minute 12 of his speech, time for Bumblebee's tune-up!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon military budget allocation?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 60% fusion cannons, 30% Starscream replacement parts, 9% Energon, 1% actual strategy. The strategy line item keeps getting cut for more cannons.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Great War end with a dance-off?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: After 4 million years, both sides agreed that whoever had the sickest moves would win Cybertron. Jazz vs. Soundwave in the ultimate breakdancing battle. The universe was saved by funk.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Combaticons' coordinated attack fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They spent so long arguing about who would form which limb that the Autobots had time to build fortifications. Bruticus ended up with two left arms and no legs.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Aerialbots tried air superiority tactics?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They dominated the skies until someone pointed out Cybertron has no atmosphere. Silverbolt crashed into the non-existent stratosphere.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Protectobots' defensive strategy backfire?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They formed a defensive perimeter so tight that they couldn't actually fight back. The Decepticons just walked around them and took the city anyway.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most confusing Decepticon military rank?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Temporary Supreme Commander (Until Starscream Betrays Me)' - a position currently held by 847 different Decepticons, all named Starscream.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Dinobots' shock and awe tactics work too well?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They shocked and awed themselves by accidentally stepping on their own teammates. Grimlock declared it 'best plan ever' because it confused the enemy.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried trench warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They dug trenches so deep they reached Cybertron's core and accidentally woke up Primus. The war paused while everyone apologized to their planet.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot artillery corps have perfect accuracy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They only fired when Megatron was monologuing, creating a predictable 20-minute window where he stood perfectly still to deliver speeches.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of a military parade?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Marching in perfect formation while Starscream flies overhead plotting betrayal. The parade ends when Starscream inevitably attacks the parade.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot scouts always return with intelligence?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons posted their battle plans on Decepti-Twitter. 'About to attack Autobot base at 3pm, don't tell anyone!' #EvilPlans

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried guerrilla warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They painted themselves green and hid in Cybertron's non-existent jungle. The Autobots found them immediately because giant robots don't blend in.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot medics never run out of patients?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons kept creating new injuries with their 'friendly fire incidents' (see Starscream, definition of).

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most effective Decepticon battle formation?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The 'V' formation - for 'Victory' or 'Very likely to be betrayed by Starscream.' Both interpretations are equally accurate.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Stunticons' high-speed assault crash and burn?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They went so fast they crashed into their own battle plan. Motormaster claimed it was a 'tactical collision with enemy strategy.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Technobots tried calculated warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Computron calculated 847 different battle scenarios, all ending with Starscream's betrayal. They spent the battle doing probability equations instead of fighting.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot snipers never miss?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They aimed for Megatron's ego - the largest target on any battlefield. Even Starscream couldn't miss that.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon military's favorite weather condition?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Solar storms - they make Starscream's betrayal harder to detect because everyone's circuits are already scrambled.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot engineers always win siege warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They built fortifications using Decepticon monologues as structural support - Megatron's speeches were long enough to span any gap.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried night operations?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They forgot Cybertron has no day/night cycle. The Autobots just turned off the lights and watched them bump into each other for 6 hours.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot communications always work perfectly?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons jammed their own signals by having Starscream scream over every radio channel about his inevitable betrayal.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most feared weapon in Decepticon arsenal?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Starscream's loyalty - it's so unpredictable it could backfire on anyone, including Starscream himself.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot demolition teams never destroy the wrong target?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They just followed Starscream's laser blasts - wherever he was shooting from was clearly the Decepticon command center.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried amphibious assaults?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They sank immediately because Cybertron has no water. The assault became an underground operation when they tunneled to the planet's core instead.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot supply lines never break?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons were too busy forming supply lines of their own - all leading to Starscream's inevitable coup attempt.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon military's motto?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Victory through superior firepower... and by blaming Starscream when that doesn't work.' - Official Decepticon Field Manual, page 847.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot flanking maneuvers always succeed?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons were always looking backward to check if Starscream was about to betray them. Flanking became front-al attacking.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried psychological warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They tried to demoralize Autobots by broadcasting Starscream's betrayal statistics. The Autobots found it oddly comforting and motivational.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot heavy artillery always have perfect timing?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They synchronized their attacks with Megatron's dramatic pauses during monologues. His ego provided the perfect timing mechanism.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of a military tribunal?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Court is now in session. The defendant is accused of not being Starscream. Verdict: Guilty of not causing enough betrayal.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot rapid response teams always arrive first?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons spent the first 20 minutes of every battle arguing about Starscream's latest betrayal. By the time they finished, the battle was over.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried winter warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They froze solid because Cybertron has no seasons. The Autobots just chipped them out and used them as ice sculptures of defeat.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot reconnaissance always return accurate intel?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons posted their battle plans on Decepti-Book with location tags. 'About to attack this specific base at these exact coordinates!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most reliable Decepticon military strategy?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Plan for Starscream's betrayal, then plan for the betrayal of that plan, then get betrayed anyway.' - Advanced Military Theory, Decepticon Academy.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot defensive perimeters never fail?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons kept testing them by sending Starscream to 'negotiate' - his betrayal attempts became free perimeter testing.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried chemical warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They created a gas that made Transformers tell the truth. The entire Decepticon army immediately confessed to 847 different betrayals.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot command structure never collapse?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Optimus Prime's leadership was so inspirational that even Decepticons considered defecting. Megatron considered this a 'tactical advantage' somehow.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of military intelligence?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Intelligence suggests Starscream will betray us. Source: It's Tuesday.' - Daily Decepticon Intelligence Briefing.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot air support always arrive on time?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticon air force was grounded by Starscream's daily mutiny meetings. Aerialbots had the skies to themselves.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried siege warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They laid siege to an Autobot base for 4 million years, forgetting that Autobots can just transform and drive away. The siege ended when they ran out of Energon.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot engineers always win the war of attrition?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because they built repair bays faster than the Decepticons could create Starscream betrayal incidents. Supply exceeded demand for treachery.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of a ceasefire?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'We cease firing... at Autobots... temporarily... while we deal with Starscream's latest betrayal... then resume firing at everyone.' - Standard ceasefire terms.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot special operations always succeed?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons were too busy conducting special operations against Starscream to notice the Autobots conducting actual special operations.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried blitzkrieg tactics?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They blitzed so quickly they outran their own battle plan, which Starscream was carrying. The blitzkrieg became a 'where did we put our strategy' maneuver.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot medical evacuation teams never lose a patient?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons were too busy evacuating their own betrayers to interfere. Starscream evacuation became a full-time job.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most successful Decepticon military campaign?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'The Great Starscream Hunt of 2024' - they successfully hunted down and defeated Starscream's betrayal... for 3.7 seconds before he betrayed again.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot heavy armor divisions always roll to victory?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because they rolled right over the Decepticons who were standing still arguing about Starscream's latest betrayal. Armor > Angry arguing.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried guerrilla tactics?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They became actual gorillas and pounded their chests. The Autobots were so confused they won by default while the Decepticons figured out how to transform back.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot commandos never fail a mission?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticon command structure was too busy commanding each other to stop Starscream to notice actual commandos. Mission accomplished by distraction.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of military discipline?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'Discipline is important. That's why we discipline Starscream 847 times per day. He keeps volunteering for the position.' - Decepticon Military Code.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot mechanized infantry always advance successfully?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticons mechanized their infantry into arguing machines that spent the battle debating Starscream's loyalty. Advance while they argue.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What happened when the Decepticons tried electronic warfare?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: They hacked their own systems to prevent Starscream's betrayal. The hack was so successful they couldn't access their own battle plans. Victory by self-sabotage.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did the Autobot armored divisions always break through?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the Decepticon defensive lines were too busy defending against Starscream's inevitable betrayal to notice actual armored divisions. Breakthrough achieved.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Decepticon version of a military victory?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: 'We won! Wait, Starscream just betrayed us. Now we lost. Actually, we won again because Starscream betrayed the betrayers. Victory achieved through betrayal inception!'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the difference between Optimus Prime and a motivational speaker?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: At least the motivational speaker eventually stops talking about freedom. Optimus has been giving the same speech for 40 years.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Megatron keep losing to Optimus?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because for a 'tactical genius,' his entire strategy is 'point fusion cannon, miss completely, scream about Prime.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Starscream's actual superpower?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The ability to fail at betrayal so consistently that it's statistically impossible. Even coin flips have better odds.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why doesn't Bumblebee talk?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because even his voice box got tired of being the designated 'kid appeal' character in a war about genocide.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Ironhide's biggest weakness?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His complete inability to solve any problem without suggesting 'we use bigger guns.' Diplomacy died with this guy.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Jazz die in the movie?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because being 'cool' isn't bulletproof, and Michael Bay needed to prove he could kill anyone except the toyetic main characters.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Ratchet's medical specialty?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Patching up plot holes with random gadgets while complaining about everyone else's battle damage. He's basically space WebMD.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Wheeljack's lab keep exploding?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'innovation' apparently means 'what if we made everything into a bomb, but like, science-y?'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Prowl's personality like?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Imagine if a spreadsheet gained sentience and decided to be aggressively boring about military tactics.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Ultra Magnus keep getting passed over for leadership?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'I can't deal with that now' isn't exactly inspiring when your planet is literally being eaten by a giant robot.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Grimlock's IQ?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Somewhere between 'me Grimlock king' and 'me Grimlock need instructions for door.' The Dinobots were a mistake.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Soundwave never show his face?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because even he knows looking like a walking boombox with a visor was a design choice made during someone's edgy phase.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Shockwave's actual shock?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: That anyone takes his 'logic' seriously when his entire plan involves turning Cybertron into a giant spaceship. That's not logic, that's madness.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Blaster exist?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because apparently the Autobots needed their own walking stereo system to counter Soundwave's boombox superiority complex.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Devastator's biggest flaw?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: The fact that six construction vehicles combining into a giant robot somehow makes them collectively dumber than individual bricks.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Perceptor transform into a microscope?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because being useful in combat was apparently optional, and examining things really closely is definitely what you need during robot wars.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Blurr's superpower?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Talking so fast that nobody can understand his exposition dumps. It's like having a caffeine overdose as a personality.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why did Hot Rod become Rodimus Prime?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Optimus needed someone to carry on the tradition of making terrible decisions while looking dramatically into the distance.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Kup's actual role?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Being old enough to complain about everything while somehow surviving through pure plot armor and 'back in my day' speeches.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Arcee exist?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because the writers needed exactly one female Transformer to prove they could be progressive while still making her pink.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Jetfire's deal?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Being the Transformer equivalent of that one uncle who won't stop talking about his glory days while needing help transforming.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Omega Supreme never do anything?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because being a giant spaceship/base/robot apparently means standing around looking impressive while everyone else actually fights.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Blitzwing's personality?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Three personalities, all of them terrible. It's like having dissociative identity disorder, but somehow more annoying.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Astrotrain exist?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because apparently someone thought 'what if we made a triple-changer, but his third mode is just being completely useless in space?'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Ramjet's special ability?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Ramming into things headfirst. That's it. That's the entire character. A concussion with wings.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Dirge look like that?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'doom and despair' apparently needed a face, and that face needed to be the most melodramatic jet in existence.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Thrust's actual thrust?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His overwhelming confidence in being completely average. He's the participation trophy of Decepticon jets.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Cyclonus exist?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: To prove that even when you get upgraded by a planet-eating god, you can still look like a flying purple disappointment.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Scourge's sweep about?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Leading an army of identical clones who somehow manage to miss every shot while looking like rejected Halloween decorations.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Galvatron keep Megatron's memories?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because even cosmic-level upgrades can't fix being terrible at winning. He's literally Megatron with anger management issues.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Unicron's actual plan?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Eat planets. That's it. No nuance, no strategy, just cosmic obesity with a planet-sized appetite for destruction.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Primus suck at his job?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Creating an entire race of robots just to fight an eternal war is the worst case of parenting in cosmic history.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Matrix of Leadership actually good for?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Making dramatic speeches and occasionally bringing people back from the dead, but somehow never preventing wars or actual problems.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why do Transformers keep getting rebooted?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because Hollywood discovered that nostalgia plus robots equals money, and character development is optional when you can just explode things.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Michael Bay's contribution to Transformers?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Proving that you can make billions of dollars by replacing story with explosions and character arcs with product placement.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does every Transformer need a vehicle mode?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'disguise' apparently means 'turn into the most conspicuous version of Earth transportation possible while still being 20 feet tall.'

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the Allspark's actual purpose?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Creating life that immediately starts murdering each other. It's like a cosmic 3D printer designed by someone who hates peace.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why do Decepticons keep following Megatron?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Stockholm syndrome with a side of 'at least he's not Starscream.' That's literally the bar for Decepticon leadership.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Optimus Prime's greatest weakness?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: His inability to make a decision without first giving a 20-minute speech about the weight of leadership and the cost of war.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does Megatron transform into a gun?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because subtlety is for winners, and nothing says 'tactical genius' like turning into a weapon that someone else has to wield.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's Starscream's leadership potential?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Negative infinity. He could lead a parade into a ditch while blaming everyone else for not following his flawless navigation.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why do Autobots always win?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because plot armor is stronger than any alloy in the universe, and the good guys always win in stories designed to sell toys.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the real reason Transformers fight?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because without the eternal war, they'd have to get actual jobs, and 'professional transforming' isn't a viable career path.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does every Transformer have a tragic backstory?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because 'I was built yesterday and immediately started fighting' doesn't have the same emotional weight as centuries of manufactured trauma.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most unrealistic thing about Transformers?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: That beings capable of interstellar travel and transformation can't figure out basic conflict resolution without resorting to planetary warfare.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why do Transformers have such big egos?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: When you're a 20-foot tall robot that turns into a vehicle, humility apparently gets left in the transformation cog.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the actual Matrix of Leadership?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: A cosmic glow stick that somehow makes you responsible for everyone else's terrible decisions while giving you the power to make equally terrible ones.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: Why does every Transformer need to announce their transformation?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: Because subtlety died with Cybertron, and apparently shouting your own name while transforming is peak intimidation strategy.

transformers_politics_war_jokes.setup: What's the most impressive thing about Transformers?
transformers_politics_war_jokes.delivery: That they've been fighting the same war for millions of years and somehow haven't figured out that maybe, just maybe, they're the problem.
